name: Read-only access is sufficient to get the sync job

error.reason: action [cluster:admin/xpack/connector/sync_job/get] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-user] with effective roles [user], this action is granted by the cluster privileges [monitor_connector,manage_connector,manage,all]
